remarks: The set of 3-dim lattice volumes in a Hilbert lattice.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Jul-2012.)
statement:
lvolset.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lvolset.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
lvolset.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
lvolset.v $e |- V = ( LVols ` K ) $.
lvolset $p |- ( K e. A -> V = { x e. B | E. y e. P y C x } ) $.
$d B x $.
$d K x y $.
$d P y $.
